speaker.whotheyare: Margaret Mitchell is a senior research scientist in Google's Research & Machine Intelligence group, working on artificial intelligence.
speaker.whylisten: Margaret Mitchell's research involves vision-language and grounded language generation, focusing on how to evolve artificial intelligence towards positive goals. Her work combines computer vision, natural language processing, social media as well as many statistical methods and insights from cognitive science. Before Google, Mitchell was a founding member of Microsoft Research's "Cognition" group, focused on advancing artificial intelligence, and a researcher in Microsoft Research's Natural Language Processing group.
